title: Leagues New Client eat my RAM

embed.description: A .png image with topic of No Topic uploaded by RedRainDoge. Leagues new client likes ram all of a sudden: Nom Nom Nom

replies.body: Ive had a similar experience, having to close alot of programs to compensate. Im sure they will fix it ASAP.

Hey there,

I'm not sure of the cause of this as I do not experience this issue under Windows, however you'd be better off posting this over on the [Alpha Client Discussion](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client) board.
